Attach a magnetic knife block to the back of a coat rack and use it as a mini kitchen tool station.
Hang a small birdhouse or bird feeder on the coat rack to attract wildlife.
Use the coat rack as a clothesline by hanging clothes or sheets with clothespins.
Attach a hanging hammock to the coat rack and use it as a relaxing spot in the corner of the room.
Use the coat rack as a bookshelf by attaching books or shelves to the back of it.
